1.0.name: wordpress/images-beautifier
1.0.description:
The easiest way to beautify your images with simple shortcode. Any image placed inside the shortcode will be wrapped with custom style provided by the plugin.

Usage

[image type=""] <img src="yourimage.jpg" alt="image"> [/image]
Optional arguments:
* type: rounded, beauty, polaroid, circle

Support

  • Support forum.
  • Github repo.

Project Info

  • Developed by Satrya.

Credit

  • Twitter bootstrap images style.
